title: The Loser’s Treat!
detail_text: <:th_ch0205/>Gooo, Ai smaaash!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Uwaaa! I couldn’t get it....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Yaaay! Ai guesses that makes it 7 to 3.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Uuuu, you’re really good at table tennis, Ai-chan~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Hehe, well, Ai has also been helping the table tennis club, so.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Mmngh.... I’ll also show you a beautiful smash finish like yours and get one point, okay! This is just the beginning, Ai-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>That’s the spirit! Then, you’ll serve next, Riko.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>I’ll give you a special serve that even you can’t respond to, Ai-chan. After all, I have post-bath fruit milk on the line, so I’m definitely going to win!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Fufufu, would you be able to win against me, Ai wonders~♪ Ah, if Ai wins, it’s coffee milk, okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Fufu, got it♪ Alright then, let’s continue the match, here I go~~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
